sense.def: Alternative Names jing zi chu 精自出 , spontaneous seminal emission; jing yi zi chu 精溢自出 , jing liu 精流 , seminal flow; shen hua 腎滑 , smooth [flow from the] kidneys Pathological Condition of emissions of seminal fluid, in males independently of erotic dreams, in severe cases with continuous leakage even while awake. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 14: 腎氣乏弱， 精滑，夜夢泄，宜服薯蕷散方 , “In the case of kidney qi feebleness; smooth flow of essence/semen , (i.e.) wet dreams, the recipe to ingest the powder with shu yu is advisable”.
